titleStmt.title: Great Brittaines resurrection: or the Parliaments passing bell By vvay of psalmodie, against the tryumphing of the Papists, in their seuen psalmes. And in imitation of the song of the three nobles of Israel, deliuered out of the fierie ouen of Babell. By VVilliam Hubbard, Chaplaine to the Kings Maiestie, in his Highness Tower of London. Seene and allowed.
titleStmt.author: Hubbock, William, b. 1560.

titleStmt.title: Great Brittaines resurrection: or the Parliaments passing bell By vvay of psalmodie, against the tryumphing of the Papists, in their seuen psalmes. And in imitation of the song of the three nobles of Israel, deliuered out of the fierie ouen of Babell. By VVilliam Hubbard, Chaplaine to the Kings Maiestie, in his Highness Tower of London. Seene and allowed.
titleStmt.author: Hubbock, William, b. 1560.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. C[reede] for Arthur Iohnson, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the white Horse,

notesStmt.note: Author's name is corrected in the errata to Hubbocke--cf. STC.
Identified as STC 13896 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
